nodes.bodyText: Can you add a license header to the file? Also, we usually do not use * in the imports.
Should the unit test use a value different from the default value?

commit.message: Add a license header to `FutureCompletingBlockingQueueTest` & Modify SPECIFIED_CAPACITY to 20000 for unit test
